node.doctext:
CST review archive 9

This is a storage node for CST reviews. Contents are moved her from [CST_Chat].

This archive begins on 01/27/04, ends 02/24/04. Now using [CST_Storage_10].

See also Quest Storage collabs [CST_Storage_1|1], [CST_Storage_2|2], [CST_Storage_3|3], [CST_Storage_4|4], [CST_Storage_5|5], [CST_Storage_6|6], [CST_Storage_7|7], [CST_Storage_8|8].

14 February 2004

Writeup Title: [LXXXVIII]
Author: [irnerio]
Date reviewed: February 14, 2004
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Category: Poetry
Public domain content: No.
Original Author's Permission Status: Unknown.
Quoted content word count: N/A
Total writeup word count: N/A
Quoted Content less than 33%:100%
Compliance Assessment: No.
Reward Recommendation:
Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request: “2004.2.3@19:13 [GrouchyOldMan] says [dannye] says I think that everything in here by [irnerio] may be a problem, ©-wise.”
Notes: Unfortunately because copyrighted works can no longer be kept on E2 a several of your poetry writes have to be removed.
[LXXXVIII],[Autobiographia Literaria ],[Two Songs], [The Room],[pleasures] and [Ficus Plant Announces Candidacy for Congress] because it is copyrighted by Common Dreams News Center at: http://www.commondreams.org/news2000/0426-09.htm
Many of us are very sorry for this loss of information to the database. I hope you will read through the though the [E2 Copyright changes] write up for some suggestions and ideas and consider reposting them. Please feel free to msg me with any questions you may have. Kindest regards.

Category: Lyric
Public domain content: No
Original Author's Permission Status: NA
Quoted content word count: ~250
Total writeup word count: 1405
Quoted Content less than 33%: Yes, 19%
Compliance Assessment: Yes
Reward Recommendation: Upvote
Quest Admin Final Signoff: gom
Review Request(Noder's /msg text): 2004.1.29@22:50 onemorekiss says please review the copyright compliace of En Berne. Thank you
Notes: This is marginally copyright compliant under fair use based on the assumption that the "translation" verses are also original text. I'll approve it on the condition that you agree to remove it from E2 immediately if anyone complains. Okay?

Reviewer: [GrouchyOldMan]
Category: Prose
Public domain content: No
Original Author's Permission Status: Received
Quoted content word count:
Total writeup word count:
Quoted Content less than 33%: (quoted material word count / Total writeup word count)

Reward Recommendation:
Quest Admin Final Signoff: gom
Review Request(Noder's /msg text): mkb says is The Evil OVerlord List kosher copyrightwise? I think I've seen that elsewhere.
Notes: you said "Hi there. I'd say Evil OVerlord List is cool as permission has been explicitly received from the original author. Thanks for pointing it out tho. Cheers." to mkb

Notes: User has not logged in for 3.3 years. Write up deleted. User was msgd “I'm sorry to say that because of the [E2 copyright changes] we can no longer keep copyrighted works on the server. If you have any questions please feel free to msg me. Kindest regards, [Lometa].”

Writeup Title: [The Gashlycrumb Tinies]
Author: [hodgepodge]
Date received: 2004.2.4@15:07
Reviewer: [GrouchyOldMan]
Category: Poetry
Public domain content: Unknown
Original Author's Permission Status: NA
Quoted content word count: 221
Total writeup word count: 241
Quoted Content less than 33%: No, 91%
Compliance Assessment: No
Reward Recommendation:
Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request(Noder's /msg text): [jasonm] says doesn't [The Gashlycrumb Tinies] violate the rules?
Notes: Sorry to be the bearer of woeful tidings, but this one violates the [E2 Copyright Changes]. If you'd like help with copyright issues, BTW, Don't be shy about adding some more original text and reposting this. 2/3 original and you're golden under Fair Use rules. It's a cool poem.

Writeup Title: [Orange, California]
Author: [Norman the Wise]
Date received: 2004.2.4
Reviewer: [GrouchyOldMan]
Category: Prose
Public domain content: Unknown
Original Author's Permission Status: NA
Quoted content word count: 142
Total writeup word count: 583
Quoted Content less than 33%: Yes, 24%
Compliance Assessment: Yes
Reward Recommendation: C!
Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request(Noder's /msg text): 2004.2.4@23:32 [Norman the Wise] says Sorry to msg again, I am still a newb and I posted an old ver. of this node a while ago and it removed due to copyright. arieh looked at an earlier version of the w/u in my ScratchPad, and I made changes. Could you take a quick peek and let me know if it is OK now? Thanks a lot!
Notes: You said "Hi there, I'm following up on your review request to the CST_Group. Is it the Orange, California writeup that you would like reviewed? If so, pls let me know which parts are quotes and which are original?" to [Norman the Wise].

Date received: January 30, 2004
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Category: Book review.
Public domain content: No.
Original Author's Permission Status: N/A

Quoted Content less than : 15%
Compliance Assessment: Yes.
Reward Recommendation:Upvote, cool.
Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request: ” [arieh] says can someone review my wu [God Knows]? “
Notes: A first rate book review! [arieh] readily compares it to another well known book so that most readers can get an idea of what kind of read they’re in for along with outstanding character descriptions.

Processed 02/16/04

Review Request (w/timestamp) & Notes: r) 2004.1.25@3:30 Arviragus says Please review writeup The Birthday Dirge for copyright compliance. I believe it is in the public domain, but I would appreciate a second.
/msg Arviragus Hi there, Bad news I'm afraid. [The Birthday Dirge] is not compliant with the [E2 FAQ: Copyrighted Material]. It needs more original content and a clear copyright sourcing statement. If you'd care to update it and repost, I'll be glad to assist you. -gom

Writeup Title: [Gollum's Acceptance Speech for Best Virtual Performance]
Author: [ymelup]
Date reviewed: February 14, 2004
Reviewer: [Lometa]
Category: Video Transcription.
Public domain content: No.
Original Author's Permission Status: Unknown.
Quoted content word count: 309
Total writeup word count: 364
Quoted Content less than 33%: 84%
Compliance Assessment: No.
Reward Recommendation:
Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request: “2004.2.12@8:25 [OldMiner] says [Gollum's Acceptance Speech for Best Virtual Performance] appears to be a transcription of a copyrighted television program. I'm not even sure who would officially hold its copyright, but I would guess MTV. It'd be great if this writeup could remain, as it made me laugh. Somehow I doubt permission will be forthcoming for its continued posting, though. (I'm not sure whether its author has fled or not. It's bee a few weeks, but e appears to be a long time noder. I did not message him/her first.)”
Notes:

Write up deleted and user messaged “Unfortunately because copyrighted works can no longer be kept on E2 [Gollum's Acceptance Speech for Best Virtual Performance] has to be removed. Many of us are very sorry for this loss of information to the database. I hope you will read through the though the [E2 Copyright changes] write up for some suggestions and ideas and consider reposting them. Please feel free to msg me with any questions you may have. Kindest regards.”

Quest Admin Final Signoff:
Review Request: 2004.2.6@12:52 [wertperch] says [Das Schutzenfest] - Something tells me that [Faith No More] lyrics are permitted. I could be wrong.
Notes:

Unfortunately because copyrighted works can no longer be kept on E2 a several [Das Schutzenfest] has to be removed. The copyright information for the translated work by Stegan Negele can be found at http://www.cv.org/database/index.php3?band=2
Many of us are very sorry for this loss of information to the database. I hope you will read through the though the [E2 Copyright changes] write up for some suggestions and ideas and consider reposting them. Please feel free to msg me with any questions you may have. Kindest regards.
Processed 20 Feb 2004
